data.eml:eml: A new species of false spider crab of the genus Elamena H. Milne Edwards, 1837 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Hymenosomatidae), from Davao Gulf, Philippines

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Husana, Daniel Edison M., Kase, Tomoki, Mendoza, Jose Christopher E. (2013): A new species of false spider crab of the genus Elamena H. Milne Edwards, 1837 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Brachyura: Hymenosomatidae), from Davao Gulf, Philippines. Zootaxa 3616 (5): 495-600, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3616.5.6
